#### A work in progress

My solutions to the exercises in [**"R for Data Science"**](https://www.amazon.com/R-Data-Science-Hadley-Wickham/dp/1491910399/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&qid=1469550189&sr=8-1&keywords=R+for+data+science&linkCode=sl1&tag=devtools-20&linkId=6fe0069f9605cf847ed96c191f4e84dd) by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund. The online version of the book is available for [free](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/). Solutions are organised by chapter.

**I Explore**  
**2** Introduction  
[**3** Data visualisation](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/data-visualisation.html)  
[**4** Workflow: basics](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/workflow-basics.html)  
[**5** Data transformation](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/transform.html)  
[**6** Workflow: scripts](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/workflow-scripts.html)  
[**7** Exploratory Data Analysis](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/exploratory-data-analysis.html)  
**8** Workflow: projects  
**II Wrangle**  
9 Introduction  
[**10** Tibbles](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/tibbles.html)  
[**11** Data import](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/data-import.html)  
[**12** Tidy data](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/tidy-data.html)  
[**13** Relational data](https://benherbertson.github.io/r4ds-solutions/relational-data.html)  
14 Strings  
15 Factors  
16 Dates and times  
**III Program**  
17 Introduction

19 Functions  
20 Vectors  
21 Iteration  
**IV Model**

24 Model building  
25 many models  
**V Communication**
